welcome.title: Welcome to HummyTummy!
welcome.subtitle: Let's take a quick tour to get you started

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Dashboard!
welcome.content: This is your control center. From here, you can quickly access all features and see an overview of your restaurant's performance.

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.content: Use these cards to quickly navigate to the most common tasks like opening POS, checking orders, or managing your menu.

tableGrid.title: Table Selection
tableGrid.content: Select a table to start an order. Green tables are available, orange tables have active orders. Click on a table to view or add orders.

menuPanel.title: Product Menu
menuPanel.content: Browse products by category. Click on any product to add it to the current order. You can search and filter products here.

orderCart.title: Order Cart
orderCart.content: View and manage items in the current order. You can adjust quantities, add notes, and process payments from here.

productList.title: Product Management
productList.content: Manage your products and categories here. Add new items, update prices, toggle availability, and organize your menu.

addCategory.title: Add Category & Products
addCategory.content: Click here to add new categories. Each category can contain multiple products. You can also add products directly within each category card.

management.title: QR Code Management
management.content: Generate and customize QR codes for your restaurant. Create table-specific QR codes for dine-in ordering or a general restaurant QR for takeaway.

download.title: Download & Print QR Codes
download.content: Download all your QR codes at once or print a sheet of table QR codes. Perfect for placing on tables or displaying at your entrance.

viewToggle.title: View Options
viewToggle.content: Switch between Grid view and 3D Floor Plan view. The 3D view lets you design your restaurant layout visually.

floorPlan3d.title: 3D Floor Plan
floorPlan3d.content: NEW! Design your restaurant layout in 3D. Drag and drop tables, add furniture, and create a virtual representation of your space.

navigation.title: Settings Menu
navigation.content: Configure your restaurant settings here. Customize branding, QR menu appearance, POS settings, and manage your subscription.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.content: Stay updated with real-time notifications. You'll receive alerts for new orders, waiter calls, and bill requests from customers.

stats.title: Order Statistics
stats.content: Track order counts at a glance. See how many orders are pending, being prepared, and ready for service.

orderQueues.title: Order Queues
orderQueues.content: Orders are organized into three columns: Pending, Preparing, and Ready. Drag orders or use action buttons to update their status.

orderActions.title: Quick Actions
orderActions.content: Update order status with a single click. Move orders through the workflow efficiently from pending to ready.

completion.title: You're All Set!
completion.content: Congratulations! You've completed the tour. You're now ready to start managing your restaurant. If you need help, check the documentation or contact support.
